characters.name: Violet Sorrengail

voice_profile.timbre: Deep resonant with controlled intensity, slight gravel

characters.name: Tairn

voice_profile.timbre: Deep rumbling, chest vibration quality, like distant thunder

characters.voice_seed_prompt: Ancient male dragon voice, extremely deep sub-bass register (80-120Hz), slow deliberate pacing with heavy chest resonance. Rumbling texture like distant thunder with slight growl undertone. Powerful, commanding, sardonic. Studio quality with sub-bass emphasis.

voice_profile.timbre: Warm, friendly with occasional fierce edge

characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young adult American female, warm alto, friendly supportive tone with occasional fierce protectiveness. Moderate pacing with casual conversational cadence. Quick to laugh. Girl-next-door quality. Studio recording.

characters.name: Dain Aetos

characters.name: General Lilith Sorrengail
characters.voice_seed_prompt: Middle-aged female, commanding alto with authoritative depth. British RP accent with military precision. Measured deliberate pacing, cold controlled tone. Sharp edges, no warmth. Slight vocal tension. Professional recording.

characters.name: Andarna

voice_profile.timbre: Youthful, bright, playful with crystalline quality

characters.voice_seed_prompt: Young dragon voice, bright tenor/soprano range with high clarity and crystalline quality. Fast energetic pacing with youthful enthusiasm. Playful, curious tone. Light reverb for telepathic quality. Studio recording.
